info.title: Memory System
info.description: Main application of the memory system

parameters.description: this id is returned by add_memories api

scene.title: Scene
scene.description:
Scene identifier, enum values from ScenarioType:
- group_chat: work/group chat scenario, suitable for group conversations such as multi-person collaboration and project discussions
- assistant: assistant scenario, suitable for one-on-one AI assistant conversations

scene_desc.title: Scene Desc
scene_desc.description: Scene description object, can include fields like description

description.title: Description
examples: Technical discussion for new feature development

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: Group unique identifier. When null/not provided, represents default settings for this scene.

user_details.title: User Details
user_details.description: Participant details, key is user ID, value is user detail object

ConversationMetaCreateRequest.title: ConversationMetaCreateRequest
ConversationMetaCreateRequest.description:
Create conversation metadata request body

Used for POST /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta endpoint

value.description: Technical discussion for new feature development
value.name: Project Discussion Group

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: Group ID to update. When null, updates the default config.

user_details.title: User Details
user_details.description: New user details (will completely replace existing user_details)

ConversationMetaPatchRequest.title: ConversationMetaPatchRequest
ConversationMetaPatchRequest.description:
Partial update conversation metadata request body

Used for PATCH /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta endpoint

DeleteMemoriesRequest.title: DeleteMemoriesRequest
DeleteMemoriesRequest.description:
Delete memories request body

Used for DELETE /api/v1/memories endpoint

Notes:
- memory_id, user_id, group_id are combined filter conditions
- If all three are provided, all conditions must be met
- If not provided, use MAGIC_ALL ("__all__") to skip filtering
- Cannot all be MAGIC_ALL (at least one filter required)

memory_type.title: Memory Type
memory_type.description:
Memory type, enum values from MemoryType:
- profile: user profile
- episodic_memory: episodic memory (default)
- foresight: prospective memory
- event_log: event log (atomic facts)

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of memories to return

sort_order.title: Sort Order
sort_order.description:
Sort direction, enum values:
- asc: ascending order
- desc: descending order (default)

FetchMemoriesParams.title: FetchMemoriesParams
FetchMemoriesParams.description:
Query parameters for fetching user memories

Used for GET /api/v1/memories endpoint

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: Group ID. If not provided, will automatically generate based on hash(sender) + '_group' suffix, representing single-user mode where each user's messages are extracted into separate memory spaces.

sender.title: Sender
sender.description: Sender user ID (required). Also used as user_id internally for memory ownership.

sender_name.title: Sender Name
sender_name.description: Sender name (uses sender if not provided)

role.title: Role
role.description:
Message sender role, used to identify the source of the message.
Enum values from MessageSenderRole:
- user: Message from a human user
- assistant: Message from an AI assistant

content.title: Content
examples: Let's discuss the technical solution for the new feature today

flush.title: Flush
flush.description: Force boundary trigger. When True, immediately triggers memory extraction instead of waiting for natural boundary detection.

MemorizeMessageRequest.title: MemorizeMessageRequest
MemorizeMessageRequest.description:
Store single message request body (HTTP API layer)

Used for POST /api/v1/memories endpoint

value.content: Let's discuss the technical solution for the new feature today

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: User ID (at least one of user_id or group_id must be provided)

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: Group ID (at least one of user_id or group_id must be provided)

retrieve_method.title: Retrieve Method
retrieve_method.description:
Retrieval method, enum values from RetrieveMethod:
- keyword: keyword retrieval (BM25, default)
- vector: vector semantic retrieval
- hybrid: hybrid retrieval (keyword + vector)
- rrf: RRF fusion retrieval (keyword + vector + RRF ranking fusion)
- agentic: LLM-guided multi-round intelligent retrieval

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return

memory_types.title: Memory Types
memory_types.description:
List of memory types to retrieve, enum values from MemoryType:
- episodic_memory: episodic memory
- foresight: prospective memory
- event_log: event log (atomic facts)
Note: profile type is not supported in search interface

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: COSINE similarity threshold for vector retrieval (only for vector and hybrid methods, default 0.6)

SearchMemoriesRequest.title: SearchMemoriesRequest
SearchMemoriesRequest.description:
Search memories request parameters

Used for GET /api/v1/memories/search endpoint
Supports passing parameters via query params or body

role.title: Role
role.description:
User type role, used to identify if this user is a human or AI.
Enum values from MessageSenderRole:
- user: Human user
- assistant: AI assistant/bot

custom_role.title: Custom Role
custom_role.description: User's job/position role (e.g. developer, designer, manager)

code.title: Code
code.description: Python code used to generate args and kwargs parameters (optional)

BeanCallRequest.title: BeanCallRequest
BeanCallRequest.description: Bean method call request model (compatible with code execution)

result_str.title: Result Str
result_str.description: String representation of the return value (used when not JSON serializable)

code_execution.title: Code Execution
code_execution.description: Code execution information (only when using code to generate parameters)

code.title: Code
code.description: Python code used to generate args and kwargs parameters

BeanCallWithCodeRequest.title: BeanCallWithCodeRequest
BeanCallWithCodeRequest.description: Bean method call request model using code to generate parameters

is_primary.title: Is Primary
is_primary.description: Whether it is a Primary Bean

is_mock.title: Is Mock
is_mock.description: Whether it is a Mock Bean

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: Group ID to look up. If not found, will automatically fallback to default config (group_id=null). If not provided, returns default config directly.

ConversationMetaGetRequest.title: ConversationMetaGetRequest
ConversationMetaGetRequest.description:
Get conversation metadata request parameters

Used for GET /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta endpoint

found.title: Found
found.description: Whether the request status was found

RequestStatusResponse.title: RequestStatusResponse
RequestStatusResponse.description:
Request status response

Contains detailed status information of the request.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Whether this is the default config

ConversationMetaResponse.title: ConversationMetaResponse
ConversationMetaResponse.description:
Conversation metadata response DTO (result data)

Used for GET /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta response

DeleteMemoriesResponse.title: DeleteMemoriesResponse
DeleteMemoriesResponse.description:
Delete memories API response

Response for DELETE /api/v1/memories endpoint.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: List of filter types used for deletion

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of memories to return

memory_type.description:
Memory type, enum values from MemoryType:
- profile: user profile
- episodic_memory: episodic memory (default)
- foresight: prospective memory
- event_log: event log (atomic facts)

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: Start time for time range filtering (ISO 8601 format)

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: End time for time range filtering (ISO 8601 format)

FetchMemRequest.title: FetchMemRequest
FetchMemRequest.description:
Memory fetch request

Used for GET /api/v1/memories endpoint.

Note:
- user_id and group_id support special value MAGIC_ALL ("__all__") to skip filtering
- Empty string or None for user_id/group_id filters for null/empty values
- user_id and group_id cannot both be MAGIC_ALL
- limit is capped at MAX_FETCH_LIMIT (500)

FetchMemoriesResponse.title: FetchMemoriesResponse
FetchMemoriesResponse.description:
Memory fetch API response

Response for GET /api/v1/memories endpoint.

example.message: Memory retrieval successful, retrieved 1 memories

memories.content: User discussed coffee during the project sync

GetConversationMetaResponse.title: GetConversationMetaResponse
GetConversationMetaResponse.description:
Get conversation metadata API response

Response for GET /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta endpoint.

PatchConversationMetaResponse.title: PatchConversationMetaResponse
PatchConversationMetaResponse.description:
Patch conversation metadata API response

Response for PATCH /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta endpoint.

example.message: Conversation metadata updated successfully, updated 2 fields

PendingMessage.title: PendingMessage
PendingMessage.description:
Pending message that has not yet been extracted into memory.

Represents a cached message waiting for boundary detection or memory extraction.

RawDataType.title: RawDataType
RawDataType.description: Types of content that can be processed.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: User ID (at least one of user_id or group_id must be provided)

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: Group ID (at least one of user_id or group_id must be provided)

memory_types.title: Memory Types
memory_types.description:
List of memory types to retrieve, enum values from MemoryType:
- episodic_memory: episodic memory
- foresight: prospective memory
- event_log: event log (atomic facts)
- **Note: profile type is not supported in search interface yet**

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return

retrieve_method.description:
Retrieval method, enum values from RetrieveMethod:
- keyword: keyword retrieval (BM25, default)
- vector: vector semantic retrieval
- hybrid: hybrid retrieval (keyword + vector)
- rrf: RRF fusion retrieval (keyword + vector + RRF ranking fusion)
- agentic: LLM-guided multi-round intelligent retrieval

current_time.title: Current Time
current_time.description: Current time, used to filter forward-looking events within validity period

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: COSINE similarity threshold for vector retrieval (only for vector and hybrid methods, default 0.6)

RetrieveMemRequest.title: RetrieveMemRequest
RetrieveMemRequest.description:
Memory retrieve/search request

Used for GET /api/v1/memories/search endpoint.
Supports passing parameters via query params or body.

SaveConversationMetaResponse.title: SaveConversationMetaResponse
SaveConversationMetaResponse.description:
Save conversation metadata API response

Response for POST /api/v1/memories/conversation-meta endpoint.

example.message: Conversation metadata saved successfully

SearchMemoriesResponse.title: SearchMemoriesResponse
SearchMemoriesResponse.description:
Memory search API response

Response for GET /api/v1/memories/search endpoint.

example.message: Memory search successful, retrieved 1 groups

role.title: Role
role.description:
User type role, used to identify if this user is a human or AI.
Enum values from MessageSenderRole:
- user: Human user
- assistant: AI assistant/bot

custom_role.title: Custom Role
custom_role.description: User's job/position role (e.g. developer, designer, manager)

UserDetail.title: UserDetail
UserDetail.description:
User details

Structure for the value of ConversationMetaRequest.user_details

initial_profile.title: Initial Profile
initial_profile.description: List of profile sentences describing the user
examples: User is proficient in Python programming
User is interested in AI technology

CustomProfileData.title: CustomProfileData
CustomProfileData.description:
Custom profile data structure

Currently only supports initial_profile field.

UpsertCustomProfileRequest.title: UpsertCustomProfileRequest
UpsertCustomProfileRequest.description:
Upsert custom profile request

Request body for upserting custom profile data.
Will merge with existing data, overlapping fields will be overwritten by input.

UpsertCustomProfileResponse.title: UpsertCustomProfileResponse
UpsertCustomProfileResponse.description:
Upsert custom profile response

Response for upsert custom profile API.

BatchImportMemoriesRequest.title: BatchImportMemoriesRequest
BatchImportMemoriesRequest.description: Batch import request body for POST /api/v1/memories/import

user_details.description: User details map keyed by user ID.
